game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Raise the ancient temple from the sands of time.
game.description: Retrieve the fabled Sceptre of Light, hidden deep within the long-abandoned temple. Return it to High Priestess Aria at the sacred site of Serenity's Oasis.

task.objective: Navigate through the treacherous sand dunes to reach the temple entrance.
task.description: Beware of hidden sand traps and avoid dehydration by drinking from an oasis along the way.

task.objective: Decipher the ancient puzzles within the temple to unlock its inner sanctum.
task.description: Use your wit and knowledge of the ancient civilization that built this temple to solve the riddles.

task.objective: Raise the Sceptre of Light from its pedestal.
task.description: A magical energy surge will activate upon completion. Be prepared for a challenge as you hold onto it.
